text.text: Welcome to the next iteration of Blockbench!
Get ready for brand new elements, a new design, and over 100 new features and changes!

features.title: Armatures
features.text: Animate your models with mesh deformation using armatures! This is super fun!

features.title: Splines & Billboards
features.text: Two brand new types of elements: Splines make it easy to create shapes that follow a path such as tubes or cables. Billboards let you add sprites into your scene that always face the camera!

features.title: New Design
features.text: Blockbench's design has been refreshed with new colors, rounded corners

features.title: Element Panel
features.text: The Element Panel introduces panel tabs and lets you see and edit properties of elements in one place
